title: 84/356/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 June 1984 amending Decision 83/218/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Romania approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 28 June 1984
amending Decision 83/218/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Romania approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(84/356/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 83/218/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall apply with effect from 1 July 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 59, 5. 3. 1983, p. 34.
(3) OJ No L 121, 7. 5. 1983, p. 23.
(4) OJ No L 350, 13. 12. 1983, p. 19.
(5) OJ No L 108, 26. 4. 1983, p. 18.
